TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ValidationManager extends System.Object implements class System.IServiceProvider
Public NotInheritable Class ValidationManager Implements IServiceProvider
public ref class ValidationManager sealed : IServiceProvider

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Enables the sharing of contextual information, such as property validation, parent activity, and so on, across validators during the compilation process.

remarks.format:
## Remarks

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator[] GetValidators(class System.Type type) cil managed
Public Function GetValidators (type As Type) As Validator()

Docs.summary: Returns an array of validators that are associated with a type by looking up the validator attribute applied on the type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the hash table of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes contains the <xref:System.Type> indicated by `type`, an array of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes is returned.
If the hash table does not contain the <xref:System.Type> indicated by `type`, a new hash table of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes is created and then an array of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator> classes is returned.
